game_modes.name: Extended
game_modes.description:
Explore all the starfighter battles <italic>X-Wing</italic> has to offer.
 
The Extended game mode encompasses every component for <italic>X-Wing Second Edition</italic>, including the ships only found in the Conversion Kits. Choose a faction, then select up to 200 points of pilots and upgrade to create your squad.

game_modes.name: Hyperspace
game_modes.description:
The Second Edition game mode is an ideal introduction to players new to <italic>X-Wing</italic>.
 
This game mode includes only those components found in the second edition <italic>Core Set</italic> and ship expansions. Choose a faction, then select up to 200 points of pilots and upgrades to create your squad.

game_modes.name: Variants
game_modes.description: Enjoy new ways to play in the <italic>Star Wars</italic> galaxy with a series of tailored and unique experiences. Each one introduces a specific pool of pilots and upgrades to build your squad from.

game_modes.name: Custom
game_modes.description:
Introduce new and unique experiences to the games of <italic>X-Wing Second Edition</italic> you play with your friends!

The Custom Game Mode allows the creation of your own variants. You can adjust the pool of factions, ships, pilots, and upgrades. You can also assign special instructions and objectives.
